title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 56 - Asbestos
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 56 - Asbestos

State Regulations

Subpart 56-1 - General Provisions (§ 56-1.1 to 56-1.9)

Subpart 56-2 - Definitions (§ 56-2.1 to 56-2.3)

Subpart 56-3 - Administrative (§ 56-3.1 to 56-3.6)

Subpart 56-4 - General Project Air Sampling And Laboratory Analysis Requirements (§ 56-4.1 to 56-4.12)

Subpart 56-5 - Phase Ia: Asbestos Survey Planning And Design (§ 56-5.1 to 56-5.2)

Subpart 56-6 - Phase I B: Background Air Sampling (§ 56-6.1 to 56-6.3)

Subpart 56-7 - Phase Ii A: Work Area Preparation (§ 56-7.1 to 56-7.11)

Subpart 56-8 - Phase Ii B Asbestos Abatement (§ 56-8.1 to 56-8.9)

Subpart 56-9 - Phase Ii C Final Cleaning And Clearance Procedures (§ 56-9.1 to 56-9.3)

Subpart 56-10 - Phase Ii D Final Waste Removal From Site Requirements (§ 56-10.1 to 56-10.4)

Subpart 56-11 - Special Projects Section (§ 56-11.1 to 56-11.8)

Subpart 56-12 - Miscellaneous (§ 56-12.1 to 56-12.4)

Subpart 56-13 - Repealed

Subpart 56-14 - Repealed

Subpart 56-15 - Repealed

Subpart 56-16 - Repealed

Subpart 56-17 - Repealed

Subpart 56-18 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 56

Statutory authority: Labor Law, art. 30, §
906

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
